success.title: Payment successful
success.subtitle: Thank you! Your payment has been processed successfully.

steps: Your order has been created and is awaiting the creator's confirmation.
You can view your booking details in the Bookings tab.
You'll receive updates here as the creator progresses.
A new paid order has been added to your Earnings dashboard.
Start work when you're ready and send materials for approval.
You'll get notified of any changes in order status.
